 Initializes a new heap at address specified and maps memory from free frames for it.

 Expands the heap by expansionSize pages.
void unifyHeapEntry (heap_entry_t *entry)
 If there are 2 unused entrys next to each other, this function turns them into one entry.
void heapFreeMemory (MEM_LOC address, heap_t *heap)
 Free's the memory at location address on the heap specified. Shrinking if necessary.
